capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's beard is really growing in. I've noticed it myself and I'm pretty sure he's been taking good care of his grooming routine lately.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly the boy who lived, and it's amazing to think about all he went through at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine being famous in the wizarding world just because you're a target for Lord Voldemort? It's incredible that he was able to overcome so much adversity and become one of the most iconic heroes in the wizarding world.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. who is the boy that lived?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly the boy who lived, and it's amazing to think about all he went through at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine being famous in the wizarding world from birth just because of a lightning-shaped scar on your forehead? It's incredible how much pressure that must have put on him, but he always managed to rise above it.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is harry's gender?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is a male. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely a guy, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i didn't know that you're a guy, valeria!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a male, and I'm pretty sure that's correct.
capsules_submitted.reply: cool! so, vernon is a male, just like harry.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, Harry is a male. I think that's pretty clear-cut, don't you? (sentiment: neutral)
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is harry's gender?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Hagrid's love for his pets. He's got a special bond with them, and it's really endearing to see him care for them so much. I mean, who wouldn't want a Hippogriff or a Thestral as a pet? It's just one of the many things that makes Hagrid such a unique and interesting character in the wizarding world.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of you before, valeria, but i'm so excited to learn more about hagrid   who is he?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, those Hunters' teeth are definitely Hagrid's. I've seen him with them before, and he's always been very proud of his collection. He's got a special fondness for the ones that belonged to the creatures he's helped over the years. It's just one of the many things that makes him such an amazing gamekeeper at Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of hunters' teeth before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hunters have been known to collect all sorts of things, but I've always wondered why they'd be interested in Hagrid's teeth. I mean, it's not like he's some kind of monster or anything. But I suppose if you're a hunter, you never know what might come in handy.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. how old is hagrid?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is still going strong. Apparently, he's an adult now, which is pretty amazing considering how much he's been through.
